Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe is an excellent fit for your needs. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards, ensuring it exceeds all expectations. Given its value and quality, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially serving you with our top-quality product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
